summary:
Flunky Farm is an amazing game that takes you to a world full of action and fun!
Dr. Tiroliro, the big bad, has been captured by the neighborhood superhero, now it's up to your clever son to plan a “rescue” mission with the help of some not-so-serious helpers - you!
But only the highest value minions will be chosen for the big ransom. Then you need to prove yourself in the children's arena, where you take control of adorable mischievous creatures, each with their own set of skills and play style, adding an extra dose of fun and unpredictability to the battlefield, making each match a unique experience.
Players enter combat with the objective of reducing their opponents' weight and expelling them from the arena. Managing the weight of your character and your opponents becomes crucial in Flunky Farm. Players must find a balance between dealing damage to reduce the weight of opponents and avoiding attacks so that their own weight does not fall too much.
Here's the deal: kick, dodge and throw your rivals out of the ring to become the ultimate champion!
But wait, here comes the lightning, like it's making a surprise entrance to the party, and suddenly everyone's like, “Oh, I need to find shelter!” It's like a game of musical chairs, but instead of music, you have thunder!
Flunky Farm is more than just a game, it's a thrilling adventure, full of action and excitement that you absolutely can't miss. Whether you enjoy intense battles, challenging strategies, or just want some casual fun, Flunky Farm offers all that and more.
Climb the ladder of evil and each step will bring you closer to being the villainous boss!
